item.title: CVE-2023-4843|2024-09-25T20:06:07.459Z -- pegasystems -- pega%20platform
item.description: Pega Platform versions 7.1 to 8.8.3 are affected by an HTML Injection issue with a name field utilized in Visual Business Director, however this field can only be modified by an authenticated administrative user.
